                                    storyline




By day Gerri Dandridge is a sexy professor, but by night she transforms into a 

real-life vampire with an unquenchable thirst for human blood. So when a group of

high school students travel abroad to study in Romania,they find themselves

ensnared in Gerri's chilling web of lust and terror. Charley and "Evil" Ed must

stop Gerri from drinking and bathing in the blood of a "new moon virgin," which

just so happens to be Charley's ex-girlfriend, Amy. They enlist help from Peter

Vincent, the vampire hunting host of a reality show called "Fright Night," to

drive a stake through Gerri's plan and save Amy from a fate far worse than death.
